website_summaries.verdict: An attractively-priced thermometer that offers a full feature set and support for up to 6 probes.
pros: Supports 6 probes, although it only ships with 2
Temperature maximum on probes is 572 degrees Fahrenheit
Customizable presets for 11 meat types or doneness
cons: Probes can't be submerged in liquids
No way to change from degrees Celsius to Fahrenheit without using the app

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Update: maybe this will help others that had issues. You MUST have a probe plugged in or it will not power on! Read through the manual for troubleshooting and found this info! Updated to 5 stars. Works great, pairs well with phone. Wish there was a little more options like changing the probe names or something like that. Quit working after 2 uses. New batteries, no luck. Worked great for those two uses, but useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stokes

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for us and our son and had to have a new one shipped because it quit working. Two months later and both quit working again. Didn't pursue a refund but will never purchase this brand again. BEWARE UPDATE: 3/5/20 - the company is now harassing me to remove my negative post. Apparently they are unable to read as I have responded to every message I get. I assume that they will read it if it’s posted publicly. Dear business owner, if you want to send me a new thermometer to try and if it works, I am happy to remove my negative post and will even post something positive.....it’s rather simple. Until then, quit harassing me.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bennington

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: We really love this thermometer. I got it for my husband to use with the smoker. He loves it and so do I! It is quick and accurate. I love the Bluetooth capability makes it easy to keep an eye on the meat temperature and go about doing other things at home. The app was pretty easy to set up and use. The instructions that came with the thermometer made it easy to actually find the app in the App Store. I’m not the most tech savvy person so that is saying a lot. Over all I’d say this is a great buy and would make any grill/ smoke master happy!
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Good therm, the App sucks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thermometer for about 1 year now. It seems to be accurate and is very easy to use. The multi probe is also convenient. What I don’t like about it is it’s buggy/meager app. It has the absolute base functionality with no bells and whistles. , and if you happen to walk out of range and come back in, your graphs get messed up and start from zero. It’s as if the thermometer has no memory and it depends on the app to store data. This is inconvenient if you like to keep track of temps over time for long meat smoking sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any cook to take out guess work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer the summer of 2018 for my partner, he does BBQ and cooks meat all the time. He started using it and the app on his phone to check temperature and loves it. The app is basic and easy to use. Now he uses it for testing burgers and chicken inside to. I have now bought this one for my son in law and it has a nose case for it also. It’s fairly accurate and so useful when you can’t check internal temp by looking at the meat. Great addition to any cook!
customer_reviews.author: Graffie

customer_reviews.title: wrong temperature on one probe - great customer service, issue been resolved.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After contacting customer service, they did their best to respond and resolve the issue I had. Thermometer has 2 years of worranty and after I explained the issue, they sent me a replacement. The thermometer stopped working properly. First it started showing completely wrong - higher temperature after a 2 month on the first probe connection. ven nothing is connecting, it is still shows temperature. Second it switched to Celsius. On the first picture it shows 56 Celsius, which is 133 Fahrenheit on the first probe, which is not connected :). On the second picture is the real temperature from attached second probe, for comparison. I ruined four cooks before figured that it is lied.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Remember it's Bluetooth so stay close
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for several months but have only had a few times to use it. The number of independent probes is great and it seems accurate. My big problem is range. It's Bluetooth so limited range is expected, but it really detracts from the usability of the unit. If I, or my phone, need to stay within Bluetooth range, I don't really need it. I smoked a 12 pound brisket, took over 12 hours. It was fun noting the temperature graph, but I really couldn't sit nearby the whole time and every time me and my phone went out of range, the data was lost. Too bad, nice try. I probably wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Newell Bascomb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little gadget. We grilled the other day and used it for the first time. It was so nice to be able to watch the grill without having to go in and out repeatedly. I love that it alerts you when meat is cooked to a certain point, medium rare, medium, medium well, etc. There are spots for extra probes, too, so we can use it for many different pieces of meat. I'm very pleased with this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: SasheeG86

customer_reviews.title: *** Update*** to Stopped working after one time
customer_reviews.text: Used one time and it stopped working. Past the window to return. Very disappointed. ***UPDATE*** I must update my review regarding CUSTOMER SERVICE ONLY. After leaving the one star review, the company sent me a new thermometer, no questions asked! I haven't had the chance to use the new one yet, but I have to upgrade my review to 4 stars just based on the company backing their product. The one time I did use the defective one, it worked as described and I was able to view on my phone the temperature of my brisket. So have no worries in purchasing this product as the company stands behind it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thermometer now!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My favorite thermometer for BBQ’ing to date. I love this thing. Easy to use and set up via the phone app. You can set alarms and settings for each individual probe. The Bluetooth range of phone to monitor is more than adequate. Comes with two probes (so you can track temp of grill and meat at the same time), but can use up to 6. The monitor displays and scrolls through the probes temps. Tons of features at a more than reasonable price. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: jnel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet, ripped
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my dad. I will post back on abilities/performance when he has used it but for now all I can say is that it came damaged. It came in a nice case but the strap part was ripped when I opened it and I’m sure it will rip all the way through after a couple uses. It was too late to return to try to get another one in time
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is the best I have used. It is accurate and has enough probes to monitor the temperature through different parts of the roast and also monitor pit temperature. It also has a HUGE display that can be read from a distance and battery life is amazing. I had an issue after some uses with the unit, it would not turn on. I contacted customer service and when their suggestions did not get the unit working again, they sent me a new unit without hesitation. I would highly recommend this product, particularly because they care about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Norm S

customer_reviews.title: good bluetooth thermometer for the oven or grill
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy for monitoring the progress of the meat on the grill (or in the oven) with your phone. Comes with 2 probes, but has inputs for 6; not sure I'll ever need to use all of those. The Chugod app is fairly easy to use, and connects seamlessly to the Bluetooth thermometer. After about 3 months of use, I encountered an issue that others have reported - the thermometer doesn't turn on and appears to be "dead". A quick exchange of email with their customer support got me pointed in the right direction; their recommendation of leaving the batteries out of the unit for a couple minutes did the trick, and now everything works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Babonas

customer_reviews.title: I hope to have it replaced as i like the device when it works
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* The seller sent me a new one with no questions asked the day I left the below review. I have not tested it but I am very impressed with Uvistare. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Mine seems to short out all the time. With the slightest movement it shuts off and wont come back on unless i pull the batteries out and put them back in. I have tried changing the batteries with same result. I contacted the seller. I hope to have it replaced as i like the device when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I've taken really good care of this and followed all directions. After using it about a dozen times, the temps are all over the place. Bluetooth works well to the iPhone but all that is moot when the two probes are sending incorrect temperatures.. ***update- these folks saw my review and immediately sent replacement probes free of charge. Excellent service.....
customer_reviews.author: Martin Murat

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading reviews. However, II have found it to be VERY unreliable and inaccurate. I even thought it was the oven in our stove but and even replaced the thermostat in the range thinking it was defective. Then I tried it in our Wolf countertop convection oven and noticed it's not accurate in that oven. I trust Sub Zero/Wolf products to be accurate see photo. I would not recommend this thermometer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O

customer_reviews.title: Best meat therometer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various wireless meat thermometers for well over a decade. Never have I found one that is so easy to use, doesn't have the temperature probe break when washed, receives a signal at a large distance, is easy to read or change desired temperatures, as this one. It also lasts a long time before batteries need to be replaced (over two years and counting) and shows the battery charge on the screen. In other words, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Texas50

customer_reviews.title: Good product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, easy to use. I love having Bluetooth and being able to track temps on my phone while smoking on out PitBoss grill. A few weeks after getting the unit one of the tempature probes failed. It was reading a couple hundred degrees hotter than the other (and my grill temp) I contacted the seller and within a couple hours they had a new set of probes entered to be shipped to me. Had them in a couple days and all is well again. Thanks for standing behind your product!
customer_reviews.author: KnHnCnE

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly done fish & meat every time w/ excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to set up and simple to use. The mystery of when your fish or meat is properly done is removed with a good digital thermometer. With the phone app you don't even have to be in the same room. When this started behaving eratically a few months after I bought it, I was able to contact their customer service directly from the app. They responded quickly and I had new probes without any hassle that set things right within days. That's great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: I'm in my shop

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Your Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This baby took my smoking game to he next level. (That might sound cheesy, but it’s true). So much more convenient than having to open up the door, stick a probe in, lose heat, close the door and end up cooking for a lot longer. I also like being able to monitor several meats st one time. The only problem I have had is occasionally I have trouble connecting to blue tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Leefrd

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once but replaced with a new unit quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Used this one time and it worked great! Then I tried to use it a second time and it won’t even turn on. Updated: The seller stepped up and sent a replacement unit very quickly. I have updated this to four stars because it worked very well and even though it failed they stood behind it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bford1974

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This temp gauge is easy to use and pretty damn accurate. My only issue which is not that bad just me being lazy. The app does not keep up with the main unit for reading the meat temps. It also took about 20min for it to read three of the probes, the first two starting reading right away. All of them were being recognized by the main unit just not the moble app. Still a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Stoples working suddenly -- seller replaced
customer_reviews.text: Unit stopped working after about a month. Does not turn on anymore despite fresh batteries. --- Edit: after reading my review here, the seller reached out to me and offered to replace it. The new unit is working well again.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is simply the best....
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product around a year now. Very simple to use and accurate. A must have for any serious griller/smoker. I did have a problem around the 10 month mark. Unit simply wouldn't turn on and was totally dead. Swapped out batteries as requested and attempted to reset. The customer service quickly sent me a new unit. Finally a company that stands behind their product and doesn't make the customer jump through all sorts of hoops for a defective product. The replacement comes with the case, which is a nice added feature. Thanks to Mira in customer service and the entire Uvistare company.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Prelewicz

customer_reviews.title: Nice temperature probe
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I would like this product or not when I received it in the mail. However after writing to their customer service, I decided to give it to go. I wasn't sure it was going to work with my electric smoker; I wasn't sure it would seal correctly. However, it works like a charm. I really like the phone app. I can be away from the smoker and still read how the temperature is doing. So far, everything that I've smoked using this gauge has come out the way it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: D. AtKinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I've been smoking meat effectively before I had this. Wonderful tool to make smoking projects so much easier. Sturdy build, the metal probes are well built and the app is great. Super easy to setup, and my tests lead me to believe it is accurate. I love that it can use more than one probe at a time so I can monitor more than one piece of meat for different temperature levels. Excellent device.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanted a meat thermometer forever. My uncle always uses one when he has a family Bbq and everything always turns out perfectly. I picked this one because it seemed to be mid line. Not super expensive or cheap. So far I have used it on bratwurst and chicken wings and I like it a lot. You pretty much have to use the app, if you want to set it for a particular meat or time, that cannot be set directly on the thermometer. It just runs a visual of the current temp. Which works perfectly if you know the temp your food needs to be at.
customer_reviews.author: Astra Luna

customer_reviews.title: Service After the Sale
customer_reviews.text: I bought the BBQ Meat Thermometer in the middle of October 2018 and have had wonderful use of it since, with only one recent problem. The thermometer came with 2 probes and one of them had just broken and was giving erratic temperatures swings. I contacted the company, and because it is within 2 years since purchase, they sent me, free of charge, 2 free probes!!! (I only had one break, yet they sent 2!!!) They arrived and I am very grateful that this company stands behind their product! If you are looking for a thermometer that works great and the company does not forget about you once you've bought it, this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Used it to smoke a turkey. Connected to my phone with out a problem. Was able to monitor the temp with my phone while in the kitchen doing other things. Alarm rang when target temp was reached. Turkey came perfect...had a lot of witnesses :) Came in a very nice case to boot. Overall, very satisfied with the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing temp tracker - love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I used two sensors one for ambient temp and one in the thicker part of the meat. Great stuff. Very accurate. Love the alarms up and down for a range. Very convenient. Can monitor your smoker temp and meat separately. Makes it almost too easy which works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kvasnosky

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for just over a month now and one of the probes started reading higher than the actual temp. Very disappointed because I use both probes all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Useful product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for a year now and it works amazingly. I use it mainly for my smoker to keep track of the temperature while I'm inside in the house. The alarm features are perfect for letting me know when to vent or add more coal, etc. I liked it so much I got my father one as well. Unfortunately, it came with defective probes that would show a significant difference in temperature between each other for the same thing. However, customer service was extremely helpful and painless and with just a photo of the problem have issued me replacement probes without hassle. My original thermometer is still working perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Caruso

customer_reviews.title: why did I wait so long
customer_reviews.text: I'm 52, WHY did I wait so long to try this? It works great. Look, if you cook on the grill then just buy it. How many times do you mess up your steak because it's dark outside or it's raining and you don't want to go out or there is snow on the ground. I go out 3 times. 1 time to put on, 1 time to flip and 1 time to take it off. This thermometer just works! ...and the range of the Bluetooth to your phone is great. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: zudnik

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: App was easy to download and set up. I have only used it once but it was wonderful to not have to run out in the cold repeatedly to check on the smoker. I am going to buy a couple more probes so I can do multiple items. Keep one probe out to have the air temp in the grill ond the others in whatever you are cooking. Each probe can be set to different temps. I can't say how it will hold up but as of this time I would buy one for a gift if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Stopped connecting to phone.(edit Phone Problem)
customer_reviews.text: (Edit: This is yet another in a fast becoming a long list of problems with Android 9 and not this products fault. Still works great on my old phone and my wife's phone running Android 8) The Bluetooth just stopped working. I got it to connect again after deleting the app and reinstalled but I am trying to connect it again to cook my turkey for Thanksgiving and it will not connect even after deleting and reinstall the app.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Faulty readings
customer_reviews.text: I am really frustrated. This is my third time using this thermometer. One probe seems to be reading well, but the other jumped from around 150 to 233, then began fluctuating from 300-500 degrees. My smoker is only set at 225. It doesn’t make any sense. I think I may have gotten a faulty probe.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Just got this as a present and used it last Sunday for a Brisket on my grill. It went the entire 12 hours no issues. I was able to keep control of my ambient temp in the grill as well as in my brisket. Turned out great! My wife said we aren't going out for brisket anymore!
customer_reviews.author: MFowers

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-probe thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a nice carry case and two probes. I like using the app when using multiple probes so I can monitor them simultaneously whereas the base monitor flashes between temps. Recently I had an issue with one of the probes. I contacted the customer service and they promptly replied and agreed to send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy C

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my husband, who loves to grill. It works amazing. The Bluetooth function is very convenient so that he doesn't have to stand at the grill constantly to check the "doneness". The color beads on the probes help to differentiate the different meats cooking at the same time. Very handy and I love that it comes in a carrying case that fits all the pieces nicely. Great for storage until the next grill session.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: 4 inputs for sensors and alarms can be set on all on your Tablet or Phone with Bluetooth. Great device
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble with the APP when I first received this device but they did listen and respond and now this device talks to my tablet. They made changes to the app and fixed the Bluetooth problem and they renamed the APP so that it can be found. It works well and seems to be well made. It truly is a command center for cooking. I used it last night on mt grille and my steak came out perfect. I will try to connect it to the wife's Apple Phone later today but I am not anticipating any problems. Well Done Thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dog

customer_reviews.title: I really like the concept of being able to glance at my ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of being able to glance at my phone and checking on the meat. This comes with 2 probes which is great if you want to check the smoker/grill heat to make sure it's keeping temperature and the other in the meat. There are 4 more slots for additional probes that can be purchased separately. It connects to your house wifi, so you can't travel to the store or away from the house very far for the app to work. I have problems with it disconnecting from my wifi periodically which is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Weakly

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Unit, except the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Great display, easy to read and stand is highly adjustable. Fairly accurate, sharp probe for easy insert. Good quality carrying case for storage, probes have long wire which is nice to have. CONS: The meat probe has colored markers to coordinate the meat with the unit, but the markers slide along the probe wire and defeat the purpose. Bluetooth connection is not consistent - I was connected and app did not update to match unit and after uninstall and reinstall the alarm function did not work . I would not trust the Bluetooth function
customer_reviews.author: Chico1234

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product works really well out of box and is pretty self explanatory (I didn’t even use instructions). I did have an issue with the probes, but the company was very easy to work with a extremely responsive to get new probes to me. Customer sat is high for me just based upon how well they worked with an issue. Great product I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bbq thermometer and I wasn’t sure what to expect or had anything to compare it to. So far, it’s easy to use. It’s much lighter than I thought it would be. The numbers are big and easy to read. I downloaded the app and was ready to go in no time. You can set different alarms/temperatures and be notified on your phone. Totally comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shar-Pei Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected and is a great addition to your meat-smoking toolset. The display shows the temperature of the probe(s) as well as on your smartphone via the free Bluetooth app. The app shows the current temp, a graph of the temp over the entire cooking time, and you can set a temperature alarm to notify you when your desired temperature has been reached. Mine came with two temperature probes, but the unit can handle up to 6 probes at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: TheSchwartz

customer_reviews.title: Privacy alert:  It needs your location to pair with phone
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the companion app needs your geo location to pair with phone by bluetooth. When you fire up the app, it asks for your location. I said no. Why do you need my location for a meat thermometer? The unit would not pair so I went back and turned on location. Now it pairs. Don't like this privacy compromise just to use a meat thermometer. Might send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Campforlife

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE TO "worked great about 5 times..."
customer_reviews.text: Update- Customer service contacted me within a day of my first review. The problem with the dead main unit was solved by taking the batteries out, waiting for a few minutes then reinstalling them. Held the power button down a bit longer than usual and the unit came to life. Two of the probes gave wacky readings no matter what port they were plugged into, so customer service sent me two new ones. We will see how things hold up. ORIGINAL REVIEW- Used this about five or six times till it just died on me as I was about to start smoking some chicken. Loved it up to that point...Will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Wyohunter

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you smoke meat!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the chance to use this device. Can’t believe I have gone this long without one like this. This is a must have for anyone that has a smoker!! Love it! The one downside is that you can’t change the alert tone on an iPhone. When the meat hit my target, my phone gave me a series of really loud piercing beeps like a fire alarm. Made me jump.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Can't do it's one job
customer_reviews.text: They concept is great. It'd be very convenient to get alerts when my BBQ is done. But if it tells me that my brisket is at 203 and it's really at 150, the thermometer is useless. Therefore, this product is useless. This has happened to me multiple times, and I won't let it happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Have had the unit for 2 years - Now second probe no longer works
customer_reviews.text: I was originally very happy with this unit but after 2 years the second probe has failed. Not sure whether to try replacements or a whole new unit or try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sobiwon

customer_reviews.title: Super useful if you ever cook
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I grab this thermometer every time before I turn on the oven. Then I set the temperature and walk away. Yes, the alarm sound is annoying and the phone would vibrate relentlessly, but that make the whole family yelling with joy, "the food is ready!". A must-have to avoid burning a tenderloin next time.
customer_reviews.author: John Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with one of the probes not functioning correctly after 9 months. No issue at all, I notified them and they sent out a replacement immediately. Great response time and wonderful customer service. I'd buy it again, and just might. It works better than the thermometer that came with my Pitboss smoker.
customer_reviews.author: George J.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received, the batteries would not stay in place on the transmitter. I requested a replacement and it does the same thing. Finally stuck a piece of tissue under the battery lid to hold the batteries in place. Also, the range is not that great. If you're not in line of site, then you can expect it to disconnect from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: GumbyDammet

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today to cook a smoker full of meats. It works great. The meat actually cooked faster due to not having to open the smoker to check the meat temperature. The app on my phone made it easy as I could check the meat temp wherever I was. The alarm feature is great. I'm going to order more probes so I can monitor more points.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely my favorite tech item Have purchased this year
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely my favorite tech item Have purchased this year. It works so well. It has a graph that can actually track what temperature each probe sees which is a big help. You can do custom settings with each probe so that you can name the area of the grill, or what it is monitoring. Totally customizable. It is more accurate than the one that my friend just paid 5 times as much for. Far exceeded all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHOICE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product!!! I love mine!!! I used it for a couple briskets, several pork shoulders, chicken, Turkey, and bone in ribeye roasts. I use one probe for the grill grate temp and the other in the meat. The unit pairs up with my phone immediately when I open the app. The app is very user friendly and does exactly what you need for long cooks. I highly recommend this for anyone that’s smoking bbq.
customer_reviews.author: T Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: The Best in History
customer_reviews.text: Temperature is very fast, there is an extended temperature line can not be limited by appliances, I used to test the oven temperature is very convenient, but also found that my oven temperature was 20 degrees lower, no wonder the time of each roast is different from the recipe. Compared with the traditional thermometer, the temperature is the same. It's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smoking meats. Like they say, if your lookin you me not cookin. Going to buy more probs to help learn where my hot and cool spots are in my smoker. Everything is now cooked to perfection with this thermometer. I get to stay dry and warm while the transmitter stays outside. The Bluetooth works great it will read as far as it says I can go into multiple rooms, upstairs, downstairs, and basement without loosing connection.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC.... until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: After contacting the seller they told me to reset the unit by taking the batteries out for five minutes then holding down the power button. Still my favorite thermometer! I've used this thermometer at least once a week for ten months. Many times I've used it to temp several things at once. I loved the fact that I'm able to monitor it and program temperatures from my phone. Easily my favorite probe thermometer ever. Now it doesn't work and I don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, might need one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend and was so excited to get to use it with him! So cool to be able to cook multiple pieces of meat to specific temperatures without babysitting the grill
customer_reviews.author: Willfargo

customer_reviews.title: Probes stopped working soon after purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer itself originally was a great purchase. Value and ease of use was great. Seemed to be quite accurate too. Unfortunately the first probe stopped recording accurately after about a month. Today 1/24/20 the second probe stopped working. Lasted a total of two months. Went from a good purchase to a waste of money. I would definitely pass on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: william Doehring

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The BBQ meat thermometer ensures that your preferred meats/ fish will cook to the temperature and texture of your liking. The bluetooth features makes bbq so easy. Chugod worked great until one day it stopped. We contacted customer service and got an immediate reply. We had to reset the thermometer- super easy, and its working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a year then wouldn't turn on
customer_reviews.text: contacted Chugod through the app and they sent me a replacement very quickly. Very impressed with this company. Product works great. Might have been my fault too that the original didn't work. I would absolutely buy again. App is great and temp is as accurate as my Thermapen Mk4
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer that’s great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this thermometer for all of our cook outs over the summer. It came in a sturdy carrying/ storage case with padding. Has 2 probes for telling the temperature of your meat. The thermometer has a very nice feel to it. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the product and would recommend it to anyone in the market for one!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Armga

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any worse than this.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Meat temperature is off by a HUGE amount. 2. Grill temperature-Horribly inaccurate 3. Cannot read LCD screen on transmitter. It's all washed out. 4. No troubleshooting tips in manual or online 5. I paid $42.00 for a REALLY CRAPPY PAPERWEIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set up. GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy to set up. Very good idea but poor material, apparently. Cooked tenderloin the day I got it out of the box with the two stock probes. All was looking great until both probes started throwing alarms and reading unrealistic temperatures. Turns out the cables can’t handle standard grilling temps. We were cooking on 350F and the cables were overheating and causing false reading to come through. Will not purchase again. Will be returning. UPDATE: Phenomenal customer service. I call led and reported the issue and they sent out replacement probes. Great company to deal with. I truly believe I just got a bad probe after using the others for a while now. No issues whatsoever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when it was on a Lightning Deal, with the expectation of using it in my smoker. Well after a few months of sitting in a kitchen drawer (unused), I decided to test it out. The unit turned on for about 60 seconds, and then turned off. I tried turning it back on, resetting it, changing the batteries, but nothing worked. Unfortunately I was well out of the return window, and am very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Masek

customer_reviews.title: Time saver, great results
customer_reviews.text: I use this thermometer all the time. It works great and I find it very accurate. Love the convenience of the Bluetooth notification, I can continue to prep the rest of my meal with no worries about being overdone. Customer service is the best I have ever dealt with. They email response usually the same day. Two year warranty is not found in many other thermometers, Great Unit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This unit did not give the correct temperatures. The app is also a little flaky. Unit said my brisket was ready at 190 degrees. It was actually just 160 degrees and needed several more hours. Party was over before it was ready.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but has room for improvements
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy Bluetooth thermometer. Connection is very quick to your phone. You can customize and name temp settings and alarms. The only think that is lacking is a good graph for all the temps while cooking. There is a graph, but it’s clumsy. Also a temp display on a locked screen would be great. For the price I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jack

customer_reviews.title: Probes break quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Probes break quickly. After only a few uses the probes stopped reading temperatures correctly I will be off by 100° to 200°. I bought replacement probes which proved to fail even quicker than the original two that came with the set. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 10 uses then quit in the middle of smoking a $50 brisket. Don’t waste you money. UPDATE: Fantastic customer service, sent me a new unit immediately, have used it 7 times with no issues, the first one must have been a lemon but with a company that backs there product so well, no worries.
customer_reviews.author: S. Luedke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to configure and use
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars but my original unit had a defect in the battery compartment so the batteries would not stay in correct alignment causing the unit to power off. The seller sent me a replacement that resolved this issue and the new unit is working great. The iPhone app is very easy to configure and is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: engrob

customer_reviews.title: Great product great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Use it all the time, indoors and outdoors. Love the options of having multiple probes. Had a small problem with my unit and reached out to customer support. Very responsible and polite people who filled my request immediately. Can’t recomend them enough all around
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Helped me up my BBQ game
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the product, the thing syncs to my phone and appears to be accurate. Only gripe is that the temperature graph randomly resets from time to time. I wish it would stay for the duration of time I'm using the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Uvistare stands behind their product (Chugod meat thermometer)
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Chugod meat thermometer for quite a while. It works very well. I would like to report that when I had trouble with the thermometer unit approximately 18 months after purchase, Uvistare's customer support worked with me to resolve the issue. In the end, they fully replaced the unit. I really appreciate how they support their products. I would happily purchase another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i had to fix it but now it works
customer_reviews.text: it didn't work as received. i had to fix it but now it works. cheap battery springs were misaligned. needle nose pliers. works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to go with my boyfriends smoker I bought him. It’s a must have! Does everything you need. We use it from inside across the house and it works perfectly. I also used it in the oven to do a prime rib. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: C.leigh

customer_reviews.title: Turns a basic smoker into a SMART SMOKER! Awesome : )
customer_reviews.text: This has exceeded my expectations. So many bad thermometers over the years, but this is the exception. The app is excellent as well!! 18 months in and it still work great. I haven't even needed to change the batteries after using it 5-6 times. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W. Prijic

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: first day using this and living in arizona in the summertime grilling outside sucks. this is exactly what i was looking for and wanted. threw it on a bone in ribeye and then went inside in the cold ac watching the temp from my phone working great so far. only thing i wish it had was a alexa skill/alarm
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: but that does my IPhone no good at all
customer_reviews.text: Received the device, put i 2 batteries and went to download the app. No app in the app store. Scanned the QR code in ITunes to get the app and received the message that there was not one available in the US. I checked the Google Play Store, and the app is there, but that does my IPhone no good at all. Back it goes *** update *** app was in the process of being updated; in the App Store once again Have not used it yet, will update when I do
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Steaks
customer_reviews.text: Used this the other night grilling some Filets. Was very happy with the thermometer and really enjoyed being able to track two different temperatures. Made it easy to track both a medium rare steak and well done at the same time. The steaks were delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Smoking is easier than ever.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up use. App is intuitive and allows for quick changes to the preset temps offered. The temps for the smoker and meat probes seem accurate. I have had none of the connection issues others have discussed. The alarm sound is a bit intense and gets on my wife's nerves.
customer_reviews.author: justmeboss

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, just need a method to callibrate
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for nearly two years and love it. Use it in oven and bbq and get fantastic results (actually own two). The only problem is that after about 18 months the probes were no longer accurate and there's no way to calibrate them. Good thing was that Customer Service via email was super helpful and they sent replacements as soon as I sent a pic and original order details. Would definitely buy again but hope they do a new version with calibration...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Zaloom

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thermometer after reading reviews on multiple websites. Downloaded the app (Android) from the app store and setup was straight forward. I am using this on my Vision Ceramic grill, everything works fine. The range reaches across the house without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: PattonD

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three of these or had them replaced. The unit itself is amazing. The probes suck. If you leave them near heat even in just a frying pan for any length of time they stop working completely. At least accurately. Unfortunately I’ve given up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth will not connect
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I'm sure it works great, however, I cannot connect to the bluetooth with my phone. Keeps asking for a pin and the suggested pins do not work. **Turns out it is not compatible with my phone but is with others.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Walker

customer_reviews.title: Failed to turn on after 3 months and 2 uses.  Worked properly after resetting using advice received from Uvistare
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first two uses. Third use, 2 1/2 months later, the unit would not turn on. And yes, I replaced the batteries. Of course the return window closed after 1 month. Edited response. After my original review, Uvistare contacted me to resolve my issue. The product worked properly after I was given instructions to reset a replacement offer was also made. The customer service from uvistare was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Forinash

customer_reviews.title: Great temperature probe
customer_reviews.text: Great product, accurate temperature readings. I use multiple temperature probes when I smoke brisket or pork butt. This is a great product
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Don’t smoke without it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to clean the probes, Bluetooth works really well, it gives you very accurate readings and temperature guides for cooking your specific meats and fish. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this purchase! Ive always used the simple thermometers and never really liked them. This one is sleek, bright orange so you cant lose it and is accurate! I took another Thermometer and tested the same piece of meat and it was extemely accurate to the T! Im very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while. Working again.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Customer service contacted me, sent me 2 new probe's. The new probe's are working on the first cook, we will see how they do over the next several month's and i will update again. Purchased in May, worked great until September. One probe starts at 150 deg and goes up from their and the other starts at 180. Probes have been hand washed only, no way to recalibrate?
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves this thermostat!!!! He doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this thermostat!!!! He doesn't have to guess when the meat is done. He sits in the house until his phone beeps to say the chicken on the grill has reached the right internal temperature. I wish I could cook that way too....my phone beeps and dinner is ready.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mwangi

customer_reviews.title: ... brisket with the new unit and couldn't be more pleased, used one probe on meat and one probe ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this thermometer last night for my first brisket with the new unit and couldn't be more pleased, used one probe on meat and one probe on smoke temp. The interface on the app has good functionality and is easy to use, the ability to set a high and low temp alert for my smoke makes it a must have for a 12+ hr job.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: The product design is great. I hope I don't have the failure rate that 10% of the people have reported! It wasn't cheap. I wish the Bluetooth range was better- I have a big house and my bedroom is on the other side of the house from the smoker-- those briskets take a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter-Trash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe how amazing this BBQ thermometer is. Bluetooth and everything. Very easy and convenient to use. My brother who is a bug BBQ griller loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer based on the reviews and Bluetooth capabilities have been using it for almost 2 years work great I used for smoking what I liked about you can monitor more than one product set and monitor on your phone last week I have problems with my probe emailed costumer service and problem resolved 👍👍👍 for costumer service
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: This has taken my grilling and smoking to a new dimension
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and to dial in target temps. Alarms are annoyingly loud. When the alarm goes off on your phone you are sure that the country is under nuclear attack.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several meat thermometers and they all broke so quickly and easily. This one is so sturdy and nice. I love that I can link it to my phone and watch the meat cook on the grill from my cozy spot inside the house. No more freezing the entire time I grill! This is so great! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little while back, and now it won't connect to bluetooth at all. Reset it, took the batteries out and everything UPDATE After emailing the seller they were very helpful and replaced my defective product. Would definitely recommend this item and especially the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Haley & Paul
